âœ¨ LottieViewConvert | C#
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Converting Lottie and Telegram/Discord sticker animations to various image and video formats, with integrated sticker downloading capabilities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Multiple Format Support (GIF, WebP, APNG, MP4, MKV, AVIF, WebM) â€¢ Batch Processing â€¢ TGS & Lottie Support â€¢ Telegram Sticker Download â€¢ Discord Sticker Download
ðŸ“– Summary: LottieViewConvert is a cross-platform desktop application designed to convert Lottie and TGS (Telegram/Discord sticker) animations into various popular formats like GIF, WebP, APNG, MP4, and more. It also supports downloading sticker sets directly from Telegram and Discord.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ termdash | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Building interactive and customizable dashboards or UIs directly within the terminal environment using Go.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Full support for terminal window resizing â€¢ Customizable layout, widget placement, borders, margins, padding, colors â€¢ Dynamic layout changes at runtime â€¢ Binary tree and Grid forms of setting up the layout â€¢ Focusable containers and widgets
ðŸ“– Summary: Termdash is a Go library for creating cross-platform, customizable terminal-based dashboards. It provides a flexible framework for building interactive UIs within the terminal, supporting dynamic layouts, event handling, and a variety of widgets.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ VidBee | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Downloading videos and audio content from a wide variety of online platforms.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Download videos and audios from 1000+ websites â€¢ Built with Electron for a modern desktop experience â€¢ Powered by yt-dlp for robust downloading capabilities â€¢ Clean and intuitive user interface â€¢ Browser script for quick download buttons on websites
ðŸ“– Summary: VidBee is an open-source video downloader application built with Electron and powered by yt-dlp. It allows users to download videos and audio from over 1000 websites worldwide through an intuitive graphical interface and also offers a browser script for quick downloads.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ silence | C#
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Globally muting and unmuting the microphone on Windows systems with a customizable hotkey for quick access during calls or other activities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Global Hotkey support for muting/unmuting â€¢ System tray icon with color-coded mute status â€¢ Quick toggle via system tray click â€¢ Customizable hotkey modifiers â€¢ Option to ignore additional modifiers
ðŸ“– Summary: Silence! is a lightweight Windows utility that provides global microphone muting functionality. It allows users to quickly mute or unmute their microphone using customizable hotkeys and offers a system tray icon for visual feedback and quick toggling. The application features a modern UI and can optionally start with Windows.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ awesome-web-scraping | Makefile
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To serve as a comprehensive, organized directory of resources for individuals and developers interested in performing web scraping and data processing.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Curated lists of web scraping libraries and tools â€¢ Categorization by programming language (Python, PHP, Ruby, JavaScript, Go) â€¢ Links to command-line tools â€¢ Resources for web scraping manuals and books â€¢ Information on headless browsers
ðŸ“– Summary: This repository is a curated list of resources for web scraping, including libraries, tools, and APIs across various programming languages like Python, PHP, Ruby, JavaScript, and Go. It also provides links to manuals, headless browser lists, and related services such as captcha solving and proxy marketplaces.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ scam-max-disabler | Kotlin
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To prevent the installation or use of the 'MAX' application on an Android device by making it appear non-functional or by blocking its setup.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Simulates MAX application crashes on launch without uninstalling. â€¢ Prevents installation of the MAX application. â€¢ Works without root access. â€¢ Offers an 'active blocking' mode. â€¢ Offers an 'installation blocking' mode.
ðŸ“– Summary: This Android application allows users to convincingly simulate that the 'MAX' application is not working on their device, or to completely block its installation. It operates without root access and offers two distinct modes: active blocking and installation blocking.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source
